gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 122, Heat 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bucks defeated the Heat, 122-114. Giannis Antetokounmpo led Milwaukee with 33 points, seven rebounds, and two assists while Damian Lillard added 25 points, five rebounds, and four assists. Tyler Herro shot 12-21 for 35 points, to go along with 8 rebounds and three assists for Miami. The Bucks improve to 2-1 as the Heat fall to 1-3.
